sentences.sContent: strict rules regulating the use of chemicals in food
sentences.sCn: 限制化学品在食物中使用的严格规定

sentences.sContent: ...The government has not yet taken any action to regulate sugar consumption although it indicated its intention to do so some time ago...

synos.tran: 调节，规定；控制；校准；有系统的管理

remMethod.val: reg(统治) ＋ ul ＋ ate(做) → 统治并加以管理 → 管理， 控制

trans.tranOther: to control an activity or process, especially by rules
